The RP Group

Project Overview

The RP Group is an organization dedicated to student success and equity in community colleges across California.

Working with The RP Group's Director of Communications and occasionally the Director of Professional Development, I've designed an array of print materials and worked on program logos.

Role Graphic Designer

Tech Used InDesign | Illustrator

When December 2016
